examples: He escaped with only a broken arm.
Escapó con solo un brazo roto.
Pearl wrapped her arms around his waist and hugged him tightly.
Pearl envolvió sus brazos alrededor de su cintura y lo abrazó con fuerza.
She threw her arms around his neck.
Ella le echó los brazos al cuello.
He was running forward, waving his arms.
Corría hacia adelante, agitando los brazos.
